Name: Hitler Loves Anime
About the game: Adolf Hitler returns in the sequel to Hitler Hates Anime , but this time he loves it! Hitler Loves Anime is a ridiculous game where your goal is to deliver pleasure to the anime girls. Take Adolf Hitler under your control and satisfy every girl you meet! Run through the city, collect bonuses and punch girls and cars to make money. Buy upgrades to become stronger, so you could proceed further and achieve higher score! While you are walking around the city one random girl becomes extremely horny. Your task is to find her and satisfy with the power of your dildo and hard punches. But hurry up! If you are too late the girl's head will explode and you'll be punished! Features: Adolf Hitler himself under your control! Cute anime girls Nudity and adult content Fun and ridiculous gameplay Large city to explore Upgrades and customization Fancy graphics and ragdoll physics Achievements and leaderboard /
